product_name: Burton Jet Set Insulated Jacket - Women's
long_description: The waterproof Burton Jet Set insulated women's jacket will have you looking good and staying warm and dry while flying down the slopes. Two-layer woven dobby shell features DRYRIDE Durashell(TM) coating and taped critical seams for waterproof, breathable protection from the elements. Throughout jacket, 40g lightweight 3M Thinsulate(TM) is distributed for non-bulky warmth and comfort even when damp. Breathable taffeta lining keeps warmth inside and wicks away moisture; plush collar is soft against wind-blown cheeks. Mesh-lined pit zips dump excess heat and provide cooling airflow when needed. Contoured, adjustable hood fits the shape of your head, providing an all-weather defense without obstructing vision or limiting motion. Removable waist gaiter/powder skirt protects against wayward powder; interface connects jacket to compatible Burton pants to ensure snow stays outside (pants sold separately). Stow your wallet, phone and camera in the roomy, microfleece-lined handwarmer pockets, or stash your hands inside to warm them up on chilly days. Media pocket keeps your tunes close at hand; flash pass pocket ensures your ticket is readily accessible in the lift line; goggles pocket stores your eyewear. The Burton Jet Set jacket features a contoured waist and slim fit for a tailored look.
short_description: The waterproof Burton Jet Set insulated women's jacket will have you looking good and staying warm and dry while flying down the slopes.
